text: HEV grabs the gun. They make for the fire escape.
106 They reach the bottom of the ladder and are PINNED DOWN b gunfire from above. CHEV gives her a LOOK that says it all.
I had to see if you were telling the truth... oh, and you have my purse.
CHEV notices the purse still over his shoulder, takes it and hands it to her. With a quick upward glance he breaks cover and squeezes off 4 SHOTS, nailing two HOODS on the escape.
Come on! Wait -
She freezes - one of the DEAD HOODS lands with a THUD in spot she would've been - CHEV (CONT'D) ... OK, now come on.

EVE is pale as a sheet. She steps over the body like she avoiding a particularly large pile of cow shit... CHEV gr her hand and yanks her along. He spots EVE'S CAR parked BACKWARDS across the street and they make a desperate RUN FOR IT as more shots WHIZ AND RICOCHET off the pavement. EVE is rifling through her purse as they run. Naturally C assumes she's looking for the CAR KEYS. EVE Darn it, I forgot to take my birth control pill.
CHEV answers the gunfire with shots of his own, buying th few seconds, then grabs the purse and shakes the contents onto the ground. o keys. CHEV here's the keys?
VE holds out her hand, where she's had them all along. CHEV (CONT'D) (taking them) Cool. EVE My stuff...

She looks like she's about to wander around, gathering up things, when another volley of shots BLOWS OUT THE PASSEN WINDOW of the car. CHEV picks EVE up like a sack of grain and THROWS HER, HE FIRST, THROUGH THE PASSENGER WINDOW, INTO THE CAR, then r around the other side, hops in and PEELS OUT.
EVE gets herself turned upright and stares at CHEV, hair of windshield glass.
E

EVE You weren't lying. CHEV Welcome to my life. EVE (head over heels IN LOVE) No, I mean: that you were going to give it all up for me. CHEV Oh. Yeah. EVE And the other part? CHEV The poison? Yeah, that's true too.

e SLAMS his fist against the wheel. EVE (cracking) Then... that means... CHEV Pretty much. EVE How can we stop it? CHEV Adrenaline. It's the only thing that slows it down. VE (getting it) So... when we were in Chinatown...? CHEV Yeah. Sorry.
A LOOK OF DETERMINATION comes over her. She reaches for h crotch. CHEV (CONT'D) What are you doing? EVE his will get you going.
E
CHEV
EVE Come on, let's finish what you started.

CHEV'S eyes flash to the rearview mirror and GO WIDE. He grabs the back of EVE'S head and PUSHES IT DOWN INTO HIS just as a BULLET SLICES THROUGH THE REAR WINDSHIELD and o the front. EVE'S head STAYS DOWN. CHEV Oh boy...
CHEV is straining against the seat, EVASIVE DRIVING as sh GOES DOWN on him. CHEV (CONT'D) Oh yeah, that's... that's really working for me...
EVE'S head pops up. E VE (working him up) You like that?
Shots whiz by. CHEV Stay down.
He pushes her head back down. CHEV'S heart is POUNDING like a jackhammer. He's got hims arched into a crazy position, making it happen. CHEV (CONT'D) That's it that's it that's it... just a little...
EVE'S head quickly pops back up. She PUSHES AWAY. CHEV (CONT'D) (flustered) What's the matter? VE (satisfied) So you can fall asleep like you always do? I don't think so.

CHEV loses his mind. He SLAMS THE BRAKES to put the car into a SLIDE, exposing driver side to the pursuing sedan - punches his gun hand the window and BLASTS AWAY. He NAILS THE DRIVER BETWEEN THE EYES... the window DISINTEGRATES... The SEDAN full of HOODS skids into the sidewalk. Steam pours from the radiator.

CHEV gets out and walks DIRECTLY UP TO THE SEDAN, one han holding his gun straight out in front of him, the other PULLING UP HIS JOGGING PANTS, which are bunched up around knees. CHEV unloads the entire clip into the SEDAN before any of HOODS can react. e walks back to EVE'S CAR, cool as a cucumber, gets in an pulls away.
EVE'S face has turned a distinct shade of PALE GREEN. EVE Are they... OK?
CHEV looks at her like she's nuts. CHEV They're dead.
EVE is overwhelmed. EVE How can you... how can you do that...?
CHEV barely hears her - he's become DISTRACTED, flexing h left hand and feeling around his legs. CHEV I told you, baby... I quit.
He spots something, hits the brakes. CHEV (CONT'D) Wait here.
He jumps out.
CHEV almost COLLAPSES when his feet hit the ground. It se like the left half of his body has simply stopped working CHEV Jesus Christ! Now what...?
He unsnaps the buttons of the warm-up pants to reveal tha his left leg has TURNED GREY. He's HALF DEAD. EVE What's the matter? CHEV (pointing at her) Stay.

They've pulled up across the street from a HARDWARE STORE CHEV drags his carcass across the street, oblivious to th traffic swerving and braking to avoid him, and stumbles i EVE stays in the car for a few seconds, looking lost, the pulls herself together and gets out. She follows CHEV'S path, crossing the street through traf TORE EMPLOYEES and CUSTOMERS start bailing out of the sto in a PANIC as she approaches the front doors. She walks through them and INSIDE.
123 EVE dream-walks through the store, past the registers, following CHEV'S trail of BLOOD-SMEARED FOOTPRINTS. A pimple-faced STOCK CLERK blows by her, not looking back STOCK CLERK He's got a gun!

She turns the corner and there's CHEV - he's propped up i the middle of an aisle in front of a bin of NAILS, HAMMER one hand... e's already hammered SIX FRAMING NAILS INTO HIS LEG and i busy POUNDING IN NUMBER SEVEN. He looks up at her, eyes wild.
I can't feel my leg.

EVE is speechless. SOUND: BEE-DEE-DEE-DEEE-DEE-DEEE-DEE-DEE-DUM. At first CHEV doesn't understand where the SOUND is comin from ... he looks around as if a RED GHOST might glide ar a random corner any second ... then realizes his CELL is his pocket. He answers it.
H ello?
Chevy! Holy shit, man, I've been trying to reach you for a half hour.
Where are you?
124 DOC is calling from the broken down apartment we saw earl CHOCOLATE is kicking back on a worn, brown imitation leat sofa in the background, watching TV.
I'm at my office. Can you get here?
125 SIRENS approach outside.      CHEV meets EVE'S eyes, shak head: unbelievable.
Sure, why not?

126 An IV bag bubbles, a portable HEART MONITOR beeps. The CAMERA follows the drip down to CHEV'S arm. He's lying on the brown sofa, wheezing thickly. Some kind of Court TV s plays on the tube in the background.
( C

DOC MILES crouches beside CHEV, examines the heart monito shakes his head. HEV I owe you again, Doc. DOC MILES You're my best customer. CHEV gesturing with his head at the IV) What is this stuff? DOC MILES Synthetic ephedrine, diluted with saline. CHEV It feels sort of good. DOC MILES Oh, I also gave you a little meth. That's the endorphins rushing into to your brain that you're feeling. CHEV So I'm not... better? DOC MILES Fuck no. You're in such shit shape it's stunning. I've never seen a heart take this kind of punishment and keep ticking. You should be in a fucking medical journal or something. CHEV So... what are you going to do?

DOC just shrugs. DOC MILES The solution I'm giving you is acting as a competitive inhibitor... meaning it pushes the poison out of your receptors and replaces it with a chemical... it's a temporary fix... CHEV Then what?
DOC MILES Look, if we put you on life support we could maybe string you out for a few days, but at some point you'd almost certainly lapse into a coma... and then...
And now it hits CHEV for the first time: this is really i He seems like he might break down. CHEV (cocking his head toward the next room) Does she know?
EVE and CHOCOLATE are sitting cross-legged on the mattres staring blankly at the TV. EVE (no inflection) I hate television.
CHOCOLATE looks sideways at her: the white girl is CRAZY.
DOC shakes his head NO. CHEV broods silently. DOC MILES f you want, I can load you up with something, you'll go out in a beautiful dream. CHEV A dream.
FLASH CUT: A RED GHOST, pulsing. DOC MILES (gently) Can I do that for you, Chev? CHEV No... no, that's not what I want. DOC MILES Then ... what?
CHEV'S moment of weakness passes. His face goes grim with vengeance as the mean bastard inside him kicks in. He loo DOC MILES in the eye.
One hour.
DOC MILES regards him blankly.
I want one hour.

127 RICKY VERONA and his CREW are in the back, watching a noi satellite feed on dual plasma TV screens. A JAPANESE GIRL a red blazer, one of the TOURISTS from the bus, is being interviewed in Japanese amidst a crowd of her semi-identi friends. A TRANSLATION is overdubbed.
The GIRLS giggle.
VERONA rolls his eyes.
Give me a fucking break...
The BROADCAST cuts to a MONTAGE: The trashed restaurant, burning Police motorcycle, the car crashed into the mall escalator, POLICE sifting through wreckage, finally the sketch of CHEV'S face. 1
27 And so the wild rampage that began at 9 AM this morning in West Los Angeles continues, with the mysterious suspect still at large.
Maybe we shoulda give him more of that Chinese shit.
V
VERONA (sarcastic) Oh ... you think?    Jesus ...
His cell phone rings.       He checks it. VERONA (CONT'D) (shaking his head in disbelief) It's him. Alright, shut up.

He answers. VERONA (CONT'D) What's up, corpse. CHEV Hey douchebag, thought you might be interested in a little deal. ERONA A deal?   You're mental, dude. CHEV I want the antidote. VERONA Oh, the antidote, huh?

VERONA makes eye contact with his CREW, covering the mouthpiece of the phone; they all try to keep from breaki up. CHEV That's right. VERONA And what are you prepared to give me. Asshole. CHEV How about the jewelry I got off your faggot brother, you cocksucker?

This stings VERONA. He pulls the phone away from his face looks at it like he wants to smash it into bits, then pul himself together and puts it back to his ear. VERONA (holding back, tight lipped) Hmmm. CHEV Thinking about it?
VERONA pantomimes jacking off for the boys.
Alright. CHEV You like that deal?
Whatever. CHEV I'll be at Downtown Standard in twenty minutes. You know the spot?
Of course. CHEV Don't be late, or I'll trade this thing to some whore for a hand job ... VERONA (cutting him off) I'll be there.
He clicks off, then sits there, seething. VERONA (CONT'D) (to the BOYZ) What the hell are you looking at?
They turn back toward the plasma screens. VERONA takes a deep breath, then speed dials a number on the cell phone.
Verona. You're not going to believe the call I just got.
129 MONTAGE TO MUSIC: more of L.A. at 3 f.p.s. - the traffic flowing, trains zapping by, commuters commuting, everythi at a thousand miles an hour. CHEV (O.C.) It's going to be alright, baby.

130 From a distance, in a locked off TELEPHOTO frame, we see walking toward the CAMERA in slow motion, 100 f.p.s. Dialog from an UNSEEN CONVERSATION is layered over the im EVE (O.C.) But... you said... CHEV (O.C.) I know. But things have changed. There's an antidote. I can make a deal for it, but I've got to go alone.
He's well dressed in a sportcoat, slacks, button down shi and tie, flapping in the wind ... sunglasses, and look of brutal determination on his face ...
I'm scared. CHEV (O.C.) Of course. But you'll be safe now. And I'll be back.
In a series of dissolves he comes straight at the CAMERA his face fills the frame ...
EVE looks up into CHEV'S eyes, absolutely vulnerable, absolutely STUNNING. Pale sunlight punches through the ha rolled blinds. EVE Do you promise?
CHEV meets her gaze.
I promise.

head_text.subj: EXT STANDARD HOTEL, DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES

text: 131 CHEV bangs through the revolving glass doors to the hotel

The CAMERA shifts to a ROUGH HANDHELD POV, similar to the shot that starts the film. The MUSIC is replaced by the SOUND of CHEV'S labored BREATHING and HEARTBEAT. The POV doubles, goes in and out of focus. n one continuous shot he approaches the STANDARD HOTEL an walks past the valets into the RETRO-MOD LOBBY.

132 The shot continues as CHEV moves through the LOBBY and ma a beeline for the RESTROOM. Scattered around are hard looking DUDES pretending to read newspapers ... he passes them by, avoiding eye contact.

33 The bathroom is empty. He walks into a stall, shuts the d and opens his coat - we see a PAGER-SIZED device clipped his belt - a green LED is illuminated. EVERSE: CHEV adjusts a tiny knob on the device.   His fac shiny with perspiration. He pulls out his shirt tails ... we see that a small tube runs from the device to a needle inserted in the base of
spine, taped up with white adhesive. HEV tucks the shirt back carefully, takes a series of dee breaths and leaves the stall.

134 He bangs open the door to the restroom and pushes past th of the DUDES, who were about to go in. They let him pass, trying to avoid attention. CHEV makes his way to the ELEVATORS, hits the UP button. doors open, he gets on. The DUDES watch from the LOBBY.
135 A JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN - early 50s, compact and under fiv feet, immaculately groomed - hustles on as the doors slid shut. He stands opposite CHEV against the wall and stares him, expressionless.
What's happening, brother?
Silence.

CHEV takes a small bottle of PILLS from his coat pocket a swallows them dry. He closes his eyes and leans against the wall to steady himself as the effect of the pills washes over him. n UNEXPECTED VOICE breaks the silence. KAREN CHELIOS Where did I go wrong?
CHEV'S eyes SNAP OPEN.    The JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN stares impassively. CHEV (weirded out) Did you say something?

Now the JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN answers - but when he moves lips, it's the voice of A WOMAN IN HER 40s. KAREN CHELIOS Like talking to the wall... C HEV Mom? KAREN CHELIOS I'm amazed you remember you have a mother.
CHEV shakes his head in disbelief, tries to clear his eye but the HALLUCINATION persists. KAREN CHELIOS (CONT'D) You never call, you never write... I haven't seen you since you ran out at

CHEV (falling right into it) Right, with you popping Valium like Tic Tacs and balling some new asshole every two weeks... why wouldn't I stick around for entertainment like that? KAREN CHELIOS That's hurtful.
CHEV is an instant ball of regret.
O
CHEV (exasperated) Mom, I got no time for this...

The JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN cuts him off - this time the voi is ORLANDO'S. ORLANDO You got no time, period. CHEV Orlando? RLANDO ou a persistent motherfucker, Chev Chelios, I'll give you that. CHEV (reacting) This is weird. ORLANDO But you know this has got to stop sometime. What do you think you are, Michael Myers? They pop you and you just keep gettin up? CHEV I'm the Terminator.

The JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN does another transformation - th time into ALEX. ALEX You was that, maybe. But there's a new gun in town. CHEV Don't tell me you're talking about your bro, Def Lepard. ALEX He did you pretty good, didn't he? CHEV Yeah, not so much. I don't get it - why didn't you guys just cut me up alive when you had the chance? ALEX Verona said you was Chev Chelios - A.K.A. Death On Two Legs. (MORE)
C
He said you probably been a contract killer since grade school.

s he speaks, ALEX'S voice transforms again, this time int CHEV'S... he's now talking to A MIRROR OF HIMSELF... MIRROR CHEV Bipolar. Sadomasochistic tendencies. Adrenaline junkie. Addicted to violence... probably spends every day of his life looking for the big thrill, the big rush. Cutting up a guy like that while he screams in his own blood and excrement would be like... like a GIFT... a warrior's death... hell, you'd probably get off on it... HEV Did you rehearse this? MIRROR CHEV No, this was the best way for a guy like you: a slow, ticking clock... winding down... inevitable... non-negotiable... until... CHEV (cutting him off) Who the hell are you, anyway? MIRROR CHEV Don't you know? CHEV (soberly) I think I'm starting to figure it out. MIRROR CHEV Yeah, well, better late than never. (conversational) You know you're going to die up there. CHEV (cold) Yeah, maybe.
he CAMERA holds CHEV'S gaze for a long moment, unflinchin CHEV (CONT'D) But I'm taking you with me.
REVERSE, CU: The JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN has TRANSFORMED INT GIANT BLUE GHOST, pulsing silently.

CUT TO: wide angle TWO SHOT, CHEV and the flat, two dimensional, computer animated GHOST, facing each other a opposite ends of the elevator. SOUND: the CHIME SOUNDS, signalling they've reached the t floor.
HEV glances at the lit floor number display, then back. The JAPANESE MAN stares back at him, blank. CHEV (CONT'D) (under his breath) Some pills, Doc.
The JAPANESE MAN ignores him. When the doors open, he hustles off ... past two GOONS, who are waiting there for CHEV. They each take an arm.
Easy ...
This way.
136 The GOONS lead CHEV through a posh dining area, down a da corridor. They frisk him, finding the obvious .45 in the shoulder holster, yank it out and push him into a SMOKING LOUNGE.

137 CARLITO and RICKY VERONA sit side by side at the table. A iced bucket of champagne, good cigars. GOONS chill in the corners. The whole floor has been cleared out - they've g the place all to themselves.
(smug) What's up, dead? CHEV Looks like everyone's here. CARLITO (chuckling despite himself) Chelios... what a fucking mess you are.
( C
CHEV No shit. CARLITO Why don't you sit down? VERONA Wait a minute. gesturing to the GOONS by the door) Pat him down again. He's carrying something.

The GOONS give him another look. This time they reach dow his pants and produce a second small, concealed handgun . then discover the pager-like device. One of the goons rip the tube from CHEV's back - CHEV winces in pain. His HEARTRATE starts to slow almost immediately. CARLITO Let me see that.
A GOON tosses it to him. CARLITO (CONT'D) Clever ... what is this, an insulin pump? CHEV Basically. VERONA What the fuck is insulin?
CARLITO shuts him up with a look. CARLITO (holding the device up) Ephedrine, right?
CHEV nods. CARLITO places the device carefully on the tab CARLITO (CONT'D) (bemused) Very resourceful ...
e reaches into his coat pocket, produces a pair of black leather gloves and starts to put them on. HEV to Verona) Found a new master, you little bitch, is that it?

VERONA I'm nobody's little bitch. CHEV (egging him on) We'll see what kind of a bitch you are when Carlito hires you for half what he used to pay me... and you take it. CARLITO That's enough. CHEV You'll probably throw boss a nice little reach-around just to show what a good bitch you are. VERONA I'm nobody's little bitch, you hear me? He'll pay what I tell him to pay...! CARLITO I said that's enough. (calmly) It's been a long day. But in the end, you must agree, it all works out quite nicely. Don Kim gets his bullet, thanks to you...

CARLITO unlatches a 2'x6" beautifully crafted mahogany wo case sitting on the table in front of him. It contains several SYRINGES and bottle of MILKY FLUID. He removes on SYRINGE from the box with a gloved hand. It almost glows the soft light.      C ARLITO (CONT'D) ... and Hong Kong gets a goat to take the fall. Please understand, Chev, it's truly nothing personal. VERONA Speak for yourself.
CARLITO squirts a little of the MILKY LIQUID. CHEV Is that what I think it is?
CARLITO nods.
CARLITO The Chinese shit. (nods to the GOONS) Hold him down.
In a flash, CHEV WHIPS OUT A GUN - everyone FLINCHES... b no, wait: he's just holding out his fist, pointing the ST EM-UP FINGER right between CARLITO'S eyes. CHEV Not so fast, motherfucker.
For a beat, no one knows quite how to react. VERONA chuck nervously. VERONA Dude's gone dipsy doodle...

CHEV whips the finger toward VERONA, shutting him down mi word. VERONA shrugs it off with less than 100% confidence the room EXHALES. VERONA (CONT'D) Whatever, psycho... CARLITO I'm afraid the Houdini act is over, Chelios.
A GOON makes a move for CHEV... but CHEV spins on him, leveling the finger at the GOON'S forehead, and pulls the "trigger"... CHEV (imitating a gunshot) Booosh!

The GOON'S head is rocked back, a NICKEL-SIZED HOLE poppe right through the cranium... a GLORIOUS FOUNTAIN OF CRIMS arcs from the GOON'S forehead across the table, splashing into the ice bucket. VERONA (freaking) Ourfather whoartinheaven hallowedbethy - CARLITO Shut up, Verona. DON KIM So this is how it is.
Everyone turns...

DON KIM,   in a Ralph Lauren polo shirt and white slacks, standing   at the entrance of the bar. He's got an ASIAN GANGSTER   on each side, one of them holding out a smokin silenced   GLOCK .9mm. More ASIAN GANGSTERS appear all around, moving in, taking position. The GANGSTERS all look about 16 years old, dres for a hot night at the FLORENTINE GARDENS... but their ey are dead-blank COLD AS HELL. V ERONA What... you... he... CHEV Presto.

One of CARLITO'S GOONS points an UZI at DON KIM... and is FILLED FULL OF LEAD in the blink of an eye by a pair of ASIANS on his blind side... who are CUT TO RIBBONS by ano of CARLITO'S MEN... and ALL HELL BREAKS LOOSE. CARLITO scrambles away from the table and grabs one of hi GOONS, using him as a shield as he makes his way behind t bar... the GOON absorbs a hail of bullets... VERONA whips out a .357 MAGNUM, turns toward CHEV... ummoning a surge of strength from out of his ass, CHEV ki the table forward, pinning VERONA'S legs to the bench - t ICE BUCKET slides into CHEV'S lap... e snatches out a bottle of Dom Perignon and fastballs it VERONA'S GUN HAND... the bottle SHATTERS... VERONA bobble the .357... it hits the ground - GOES OFF - and the four fingers of VERONA'S right hand are VAPORIZED. VERONA SHRIEKS like a ten year old girl at a JUSTIN TIMBERLAKE concert. Behind the bar, CARLITO quickly punches up his cell phone CARLITO Get me out of here! NOW!
A PILOT is standing by in CARLITO'S personal HELICOPTER, waiting on the roof. PILOT Yes sir.
He fires her up, LIFTS OFF...

CARLITO'S and DON KIM'S MEN have backed into opposite cor of the room, and are firing back and forth. VERONA crawls along the floor, gathering up what's left o his fingers... comes across a SYRINGE and grabs it in his teeth like a PIRATE'S KNIFE. DON KIM stands amidst the chaos, completely unperturbed. CARLITO (from behind the bar) I'll kill you for this, Chelios! CHEV Too late!

CHEV swoons, almost passes out... catches sight of a GUN pries it from the hand of a dead GOON... he spots VERONA' FEET disappearing behind a wall, takes a bead and fires - blowing off a set of toes to go with the fingers. An ASIAN GANGSTER runs up and lobs a GRENADE behind the BAR... it bounces along and comes to rest next to CARLITO CARLITO thinks quick, grabbing one of his GOONS - a 265 pounder - from behind... CARLITO Get down!
He BODY-TACKLES the BIG MAN onto the floor, right on top the live grenade, and brings his weight down on top of hi GOON Thanks, boss.

The BIG GOON'S body absorbs the blast, which picks them b up five feet in the air... CARLITO, momentarily airborne, pops up from behind the bar like a JACK IN THE BOX, then drops back down with a THUD... CARLITO Ronnie James Dio...!
The LOUNGE opens into a daylight drenched POOL AREA... CARLITO'S HELICOPTER drops down into view, roiling up the water... CARLITO makes a break for it.
Oh no you don't...
CHEV goes after him, spinning and careening across the sl floor like a CHARLIE CHAPLIN DRUNK ACT, dodging bullets a blasting away...

head_text.subj: EXT STANDARD HOTEL, DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES

text: Police have surrounded the hotel and are pouring into the Lobby in teams. Squad cars, CHERRY TOPS FLASHING, SWAT va pulled up on to the curb, people roped off, crowd control news vans, the works.
TV REPORTER is sending a live feed amidst the pandemonium
Police have moved to surround the Downtown Standard Hotel, where the suspect ... the unidentified madman ... is believed to be holed up and making a desperate last stand ...!

145 CHEV staggers out into the daylight as the windows to the restaurant shatter - and is met by a SWIRLING RUSH OF WIN the HELICOPTER attempts to set down amidst the chaise lou and futuristic plastic cabanas. CARLITO is climbing in as CHEV clambers up and GRABS HIM BEHIND. CARLITO spins; CHEV shoves the gun in his face.
Present from Kaylo.

But just as he's about to pull the trigger, he FREEZES... face TWITCHING... knees BUCKLING... ... and we see that VERONA has come up behind him and JAM THE SYRINGE RIGHT TO THE HILT INTO THE BACK OF HIS NECK. CHEV drops to his knees.    His HEARTBEAT is deafening, GLACIAL.
(in a bloodthirsty rage) Now what? Now say shit!
(shaken for once) Jesus, man, where the fuck where you?
VERONA grabs the gun out of CHEV'S hand and points it at CARLITO.
WHO'S THE BITCH NOW?
He blows CARLITO away with three shots. The PILOT starts to lift off in a blue panic. VERONA shov CHEV aside and hops into the back seat, pointing his gun the PILOT'S head.
That's right, motherfucker!   FLY!

VERONA whips the gun around as the bird rises, intending . finish CHEV off from the air ... .. and has the gun removed from his hand by CHEV, who has climbed onto the landing skids, hooking his dead arm insi the passenger space, going up with them. DON KIM watches the HELICOPTER rise as his MEN finish off last of CARLITO'S GOONS...
Do not use a hatchet to remove a fly from your friend's forehead. GANGSTER gives him a sidelong look.
(explaining) Confucius.
... the DOOR BUSTS IN and the place is crawling with S.W.

head_text.subj: EXT THE SKY ABOVE LOS ANGELES, SECONDS LATER

text: 146 CHEV'S HEARTBEAT IS SLAMMING as the bird rises high above rooftop and the surrounding streets. He wrestles his way into the back seat as VERONA tries desperately to push hi out. NEWS HELICOPTERS hover around the midair struggle like wa shooting across at the action.
LIVE TELEVISION BROADCAST: An announcer babbles over 147 phenomenal live video of CHEV and VERONA struggling in th helicopter.

head_text.subj: EXT THE SKY ABOVE LOS ANGELES, SIMULTANEOUS

text: 148 CHEV has VERONA locked up; both men are fighting with jus one hand ... VERONA manages to work his up to CHEV'S shoulder, where the steel needle still pokes through. He slides it out and stabs at CHEV'S face ... CHEV catches h wrist in time to hold him off, but his grip is slipping . The spaces between CHEV'S HEARTBEATS have grown longer an longer ... he's obviously having a massive coronary ...
You're dead, you're dead, you're dead!

HEV swoons; his eyes roll back in his head ... he starts go limp, fall backwards ... Then, with a final rush of adrenaline, he grabs VERONA by neck and pulls him along. The two men FALL FROM THE HELICOPTER. CHEV continues to strangle VERONA in midair.
I told you I'd kill you, you son of a bitch!
VERONA'S eyes bulge in disbelief. CHEV continues to stran him until VERONA goes limp, glassy eyed ... CHEV finally go ... VERONA'S body drifts away ...
There.
Now he's alone, free falling ... it's almost peaceful up here.

head_text.subj: EXT THE SKY ABOVE LOS ANGELES

text: 49 It occurs to him he still has his cell phone. He retrieve it from his coat pocket and clicks a speed dial.
150 SLOW ZOOM in on EVE'S answering machine as he talks. EVE (O.S.) ... leave a message.

CHEV (O.S.) Hey doll. Looks like I let you down again. You were right about me ... funny, you really have time to reflect on things when you know you're going to die ... seems like all my life I've just been going, going, going ... I wish I'd taken more time to stop and smell the roses, so to speak, but well, I guess it's too late now... you were the greatest, baby.

head_text.subj: EXT STREET, IN FRONT OF HIGHRISE, 1 SECOND LATER

text: 151 Still frame of a city street, traffic sounds - CAMERA dow the ground. A homeless guy ambles along, looks up, hustle his ass out of the way ... ERONA hits the ground - SMACK! - BOUNCES, flies out of frame. Next is CHEV - he SLAMS off the canvas top of a moving convertible car - BAM! HEV flies high out of frame, then comes down hard, smashi into a NEWS STAND right in front of the CAMERA ... TRADES FISH WRAPS rain over CHEV and the surrounding area... on a different HEADLINE... "Bo Sox Break The Curse"... "Bush Swiss: You're Next"... etc. The screen CUTS TO BLACK. A beat of silence... is that it? then - OUND: LUB DUB. KICK TO SOUNDTRACK.
